Detailed Description

Class for providing an easy interface to a command line interpreter.

Member Function Documentation

bool Interpreter::Interpret ( string  command,
bool  pleaseWait = false 
) [virtual]
Parameters:
command - the instruction to execute
pleaseWait - if true, indicates that the user should be somehow prompted to wait for execution to finish
Returns:
false if the instruction fails

Executes the specified instruction from the present working directory.
